entry.value:
[{"id":"QCT-1528","entityId":"66-5587","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"User should have possibility to choose Lnb lo from setup or it can e chosen by modem while loading memory configurations"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"created","value":"1589901015525"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1528"},{"name":"description","value":"

In the setup file for qlite we should add a checkbox with name Use Memory configuration. If the checkbox is chosen memory configuration button should be appear and if signal source is modem then the lnb frequency sent by modem should select lnb lo. if signal source Ã¤r lnb only in transmit page lnblo should be choosen by modem in other page it should be selected by lnb. if checkbox is not marked then the value set by setup will be the lnblo.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1591000552514"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"QCT-1525","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"QCT-1268","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Feature Request"],"valueId":["Feature Request"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2020_qct_1_7_1"],"valueId":["2020_qct_1_7_1"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.7"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.7"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"gma","fullName":"Govan Marounsi"}]},{"name":"Estimated Effort","value":["1440"],"valueId":["3d"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"QCT-1554","entityId":"66-5641","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"QCT"},{"name":"summary","value":"1.7.1 RC1 / Q-lite memory configurations for TX"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Magnus Andersson"},{"name":"created","value":"1590664781853"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1554"},{"name":"description","value":"

We need to handle the TX BUC LO in the same way as for the RX.
If memory configuration is being used the TX BUC LO has to be read from the modem and our BUC to be set up according to the modem.
Modem can only be set with the LO freq being used in the QCT TU:s this will be instruction in the manual.
This means that the BUC LO selection in the Setups can be removed in case the Mem configurations is being used.
In case the LO freq of the modem config doesnt match the selected TU we need to have alarm about BUC Lo missmatch.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mad"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1590669990920"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"QCT-1268","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2020_qct_1_7_1"],"valueId":["2020_qct_1_7_1"],"color":null},{"name":"QCT Branch","value":["maintenance-1.7"],"valueId":["maintenance-1.7"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"gma","fullName":"Govan Marounsi"}]},{"name":"Estimated Effort","value":["480"],"valueId":["1d"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"DC-8","entityId":"66-5377","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"DC"},{"name":"summary","value":"Brush up on Artifactory"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"created","value":"1587033786537"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"8"},{"name":"description","value":"

{"id":"DEV-2292","entityId":"66-3649","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"DEV"},{"name":"summary","value":"OpenAmIP protocol is working but we still have OpenAMIP communication alarm"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"created","value":"1542805482266"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2292"},{"name":"description","value":"
This bug happens when we are changing OpenAMIP port. If port is wrong, and we input right port communication is working but the alarm is still on. After restarting system, alarm is disappearing.
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1554817242697"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"DEV-2251","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Edition","value":["Normal Edition"],"valueId":["Normal Edition"],"color":null},{"name":"Planned Release","value":["2.15.1"],"valueId":["2.15.1"],"color":null},{"name":"Branch","value":["maintenance-2.16"],"valueId":["maintenance-2.16"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"gma","fullName":"Govan Marounsi"}]},{"name":"Estimated Effort","value":["480"],"valueId":["1d"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"Unscheduled","id":"Development:Unscheduled"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"83-5567","author":"gma","authorFullName":"Govan Marounsi","issueId":"DEV-2292","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Jonsson","issueId":"DEV-2251","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Hughes process the following commands/statuses from Antenna:
a Alive Interval
i ID of the modem type
s Status of antenna
w Where the platform is located

Hughes send the following commands/status to Antenna:
A Alive Interval
B Beat frequency oscillator freq
F Find the satellite
L Lock
P Polarization
S Satellite Parameters Y
W Where interval Y
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1540381440860,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"83-5506","author":"boj","authorFullName":"Bengt-Ove Johansson","issueId":"DEV-2251","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
The customer will accept a Release Candidate when they are running these tests on December 1:st, so we will not have to make a complete release by then.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1540811706413,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Release Notes","cssClass":"c0"},{"value":"Backlog","cssClass":"c18"}]}, {"id":"DEV-2082","entityId":"66-3396","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"DEV"},{"name":"summary","value":"error handling for StartInstallationCarrier"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"created","value":"1524660192833"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2082"},{"name":"description","value":"

Affected Hardware Configuration (IDs for TU, NP, AS, CU, AUX)

NP: 22

Affected Software Version(s)

2.14.0

Problem Description

Sometimes it is possible to get Success:false from StartInstallationCarrier with TextId: "Please proceed with terminal installation before starting an installation carrier."
In this cases we should run Sequence of installation again and then try to StartInstallationCarrier again.
Another situation is that modem is sending Installer Action demanded

Steps to Reproduce the Problem

login to modem GUI and change OdUType and beam frequencies to different values

Additional Information



Expected Result/Finished Criteria

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Govan Marounsi"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"2"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gma"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1542804507997"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"DEV-2022","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"DEV-2200","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"State","value":["Ready"],"valueId":["Ready"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Unimpeded"],"valueId":["Unimpeded"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Edition","value":["Normal Edition"],"valueId":["Normal Edition"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprint","value":["2018_38-39"],"valueId":["2018_38-39"],"color":null},{"name":"Branch","value":["maintenance-2.14"],"valueId":["maintenance-2.14"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"gma","fullName":"Govan Marounsi"}]},{"name":"Estimated Effort","value":["960"],"valueId":["2d"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"Unscheduled","id":"Development:Unscheduled"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"83-5447","author":"gma","authorFullName":"Govan Marounsi","issueId":"DEV-2082","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
It doesn't seem that this is requested by any customer or necessary. We can fix this if it is demanded by customers.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1537361872883,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"83-5531","author":"gma","authorFullName":"Govan Marounsi","issueId":"DEV-2082","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
We should fix this anyway
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1542804508000,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"DEV-2157","entityId":"66-3478","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"DEV"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add status indication during modem installation"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"created","value":"1529059419944"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2157"},{"name":"description","value":"
Shall be presented in the status bar. Possibly the values from GetInstallationState.
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Bengt-Ove Johansson"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"2"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"boj"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1537361415312"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"DEV-2200","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Type","value":["Feature Request"],"valueId":["Feature Request"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"State","value":["Ready"],"valueId":["Ready"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Blocked","value":["Blocked"],"valueId":["Blocked"],"color":{"bg":"#8d5100","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Edition","value":["Normal Edition"],"valueId":["Normal Edition"],"color":null},{"name":"Branch","value":["maintenance-2.14"],"valueId":["maintenance-2.14"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"gma","fullName":"Govan Marounsi"}]},{"name":"Estimated Effort","value":["480"],"valueId":["1d"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"Unscheduled","id":"Development:Unscheduled"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image1.png","id":"85-1096","url":"http://dps-sw-youtrack.corp.datapath.com:8999/_persistent/image1.png?file=85-1096&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"83-5415","author":"gma","authorFullName":"Govan Marounsi","issueId":"DEV-2157","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
GetInstallationState is not what customer want based on Magnus Andersson. Waiting answer from newtec to check if there is a way to get these statuses
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1530014891453,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"83-5418","author":"gma","authorFullName":"Govan Marounsi","issueId":"DEV-2157","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Newtec has answered and currently, there is no way to get this status. However, they can implement this as a change request.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532929610629,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}]
